channel.title: Gdal on Eduard Roccatello's GIS blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gdal on Eduard Roccatello's GIS blog

item.title: A GDAL video introduction: installation and conversion basics
item.description: GDAL is a powerful data management tool: let’s discover it together!

item.title: Scale GIS raster data using gdal_translate
item.description: The GIS paladin of raster data, gdal_translate, could solve your headaches when you want to reduce its scale from 16 bit per component to 8 bit per component.

item.title: Converting between GIS raster data formats using gdal_translate
item.description: Do you need to convert GIS raster data between different formats? Here is how gdal_translate could help you!
